doc.previous: For example the stress energy tensor is a second order tensor field containing energy momentum densities energy momentum fluxes and shear stresses of a mass energy distribution The differential form of energy momentum conservation in general relativity states that the covariant divergence of the stress energy tensor is zero
doc.after: This is an important constraint on the form the Einstein field equations take in general relativity 4
